page.title: 17OUR SPARE TIME
page.content: NEAR HOCKWORTHY THERE IS A GROUP OF HANDBELL RINGERS THEY HAVE THERE PRACTISE EVERY SATURDAY MORNING.IN UPLOWMAN THERE IS A WOMANS INSTITUTE WHO MEET ONCE A MONTH AT THE CHURCH ROOM.ALSO THERE IS A RIDING SCHOOL RUN BY CHRIS CHANNING AT WOOD BARTON FARM.AT THE PUB IN UPLOWMAN YOU CAN HAVE A GAME OF DARTS AND BESIDE THE PUB THERE IS A SKITTLE ALLEY AND YOU CAN GO IN THERE TO PLAY.NEAR UPLOWMAN THERE USED TO BE A BROWNIE CLUB.NEAR HOCKWORTHY THERE IS A YOUTH CLUB THAT STARTS A 8'OCLOCK AND FINISHES AT 11'OCLOCK.
